name: Vehicle Telemetry
description: The telemetry system in the car will pull data from a variety of sensors to get data on speed, acceleration, temperature and battery voltage. It will then be processed by an arduino for sending back to the team in the paddock.

name: Ground Control Program
description: The ground control program will be capable of recieving the telemetry from the car and displaying it in an easy to use user interface for the team in the paddock. Will also include controls to change settings in the car among any other useful features we can think of. Making toast anyone?

name: Vehicle Lids
description: The new lids for the car are one sheet of carbon fibre thicker to improve rigidity. They need new windows cut, wing mirrors added, and an attachment mechanism to the rest of the body.

name: Livery
description: Make the car look fucking cool.

name: Air Ratio Machine Learning
description: Through machine learning we can build a program to predict the most efficient fuel/air ratio ahead of time to improve the overall efficiency of our engine.

name: Dynometer
description: Using a dynometer we can create a proper look-up table for our engine so that it runs correctly.

name: Funding
description: Get funding in anyway possible. Apply through the alumni impact scheme or student culture fund, rob banks, bitcoin scams or stealing underpants.

name: Cheese Eating Challenge
description: Eat as much cheese as you can in one sitting, current record is 900g.

name: Chip Eating Challenge
description: Travel round Selly Oak and eat one portion of chips from as many take aways as you can.

name: App Development
description: Update the app to make it even better, and to save Liam the effort.

name: Wheel Covers
description: Produce new areo cover for the wheels so they are less bad .
